resources.string: It\'s never too late. Acting now is better than tomorrow, but there would always be It was better to have acted before. We are in a critical situation in which, in the next days, our people will suffer like never before. Alea iacta est!
The government has been able to send a charge of medical supplies flying over.
A miraculous, but limited cure has been sent to the homes of the inhabitants, we may get out of this
People have stayed home! Incredible, the whole set of inhabitants. You have been able to hear simple and easy to follow instructions for a day!
Of course, someone had to take the dog for a walk for the seventh time,has made it possible for the virus to spread to its neighbors.
It seems like an even worse strain of the fearsome PandemicVirus It has been discovered today, and it affects your dear people, it is much worse than the normal strain, but it only lasts a day
The people seem to think, despite all the evidence indicating on the contrary, that the worst is over. So it doesn\'t seem like such a bad idea to go to bar to take a beer ....
